google tv 编码
Protocol=Sony Address=0x1 Command=0x15 Raw-Data=0x95 12 bits LSB first      开关机
Protocol=Sony Address=0x1 Command=0x12 Raw-Data=0x92 12 bits LSB first      音量加
Protocol=Sony Address=0x1 Command=0x13 Raw-Data=0x93 12 bits LSB first      音量减
Protocol=Sony Address=0x1 Command=0x14 Raw-Data=0x94 12 bits LSB first      静音
Protocol=Sony Address=0x1 Command=0x25 Raw-Data=0xA5 12 bits LSB first      信号源
创维电视编码
开关机	uint16_t rawData[67] = {4430,4570, 480,670, 480,1720, 530,1720, 530,1720, 530,620, 480,620, 530,620, 480,620, 530,620, 480,1770, 480,1770, 480,1770, 480,620, 480,670, 480,620, 480,670, 480,620, 480,670, 480,1770, 480,1770, 480,620, 480,670, 480,620, 480,670, 480,1770, 480,1770, 480,620, 480,670, 480,1720, 530,1720, 530,1720, 480,1770, 480};
音量加	uint16_t rawData[67] = {4430,4620, 480,620, 480,1770, 480,1770, 480,1770, 480,620, 530,620, 480,620, 530,620, 480,620, 530,1720, 530,1720, 530,1720, 530,620, 480,620, 530,620, 480,620, 530,620, 480,620, 530,1720, 530,620, 480,1770, 480,620, 530,620, 480,620, 530,1720, 480,1770, 480,670, 480,1770, 480,620, 480,1770, 480,1770, 480,1770, 480};
音量减	uint16_t rawData[67] = {4480,4570, 480,620, 530,1720, 480,1770, 480,1770, 480,670, 480,620, 480,670, 480,620, 480,670, 480,1770, 480,1770, 480,1770, 480,620, 480,670, 480,620, 480,670, 480,1770, 480,620, 480,1770, 480,670, 480,1720, 530,620, 480,670, 480,620, 480,670, 480,1720, 530,620, 480,1770, 480,620, 530,1720, 530,1720, 480,1770, 480};

信号源	uint16_t rawData[67] = {4480,4570, 480,620, 480,1770, 480,1770, 480,1770, 480,670, 480,620, 480,670, 480,620, 480,670, 480,1770, 480,1770, 480,1770, 480,620, 480,670, 480,620, 480,670, 480,1720, 530,1720, 530,1720, 530,1720, 480,670, 480,620, 530,620, 480,620, 530,620, 480,620, 530,620, 480,620, 530,1720, 480,1770, 480,1770, 480,1770, 480};
